Monthly Creative Technology Meetups in Huddersfield

archive

Thursday 3rd August 2023

17.30 – 19.30

Free entry, drinks and snacks provided, come meet other artists/creatives/technologists in a friendly, casual environment.

This month’s meetup will include a presentation and demonstration from composer and improviser Mia Windsor about how she approaches resynthesising sounds in her live setups and how new approaches to harmony, microtonality and spectral processing have emerged from this.

Where?

Dai 大 Hall (The Piazza, Unit 29/30, Victoria Lane, Huddersfield HD1 2QF)
